FuncDef: This command configures an Ethernet 802.2 LLC SSAP value or range for a MAC filter match criterion.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the 8-bit ssap match criteria value in decimal, hexadecimal or binary. Values-0 to 255.
Specifies an optional parameter that may be used when specifying a range of ssap values to use as the match criteria. Values-0 to 255.
